title: Human Trafficking: It's in your town!
itunes:title: Human Trafficking: It's in your town!
description:
When daughters go missing, investigators consider the possibility that human traffickers were involved. Children and young women have been kidnapped and forced into sex slavery. In this episode, Nancy Grace talks to Memphis journalist Shane Deitert about what is being done to fight the problem in Tennessee. You may be shocked to learn how there may be slaves in your community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
